name: Hoverboard
description: Use the hoverboard to quickly move on land and quicksand, consuming stamina over time. Cooldown 90 seconds.

advancement.star2: Stamina consumption halved when on land, and stamina is not consumed when used on water.
advancement.star3: Use while swimming to ignore cooldowns.
advancement.star4: Increase fire damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
